attributes.action: Make Commonwealth Day a National Holiday
attributes.additional_details: There are now over 2 Billion people in the commonwealth and of yet the UK does very little on Commonwealth Day, this petition would like to see the UK do more on commonwealth day to promote the Commonwealth, in all its glories the commonwealth is varied has many cultures and religions however we all share the Queen as our head of state, This petition would like to see the creation of a Commonwealth Bank Holiday.
